reviews.title: Omgoodness ü•∞ü§ó
reviews.review_text: Omgoodness I'm on social media a lot and have been for the past 5 years In that time I've gone through w/o exaggeration atleast 10 ring lights i started storing the broken stands in my laundry room and repairing them as they broke.This stand/ringlight is the best quality I have had or seen though I've in the past up to 100 bucks for others for this kind of quality.I really feel that this is a blessing for me and my Christian based page with comedy and lip syncing Love714.0 on YouTube ‚ò∫Ô∏è.I loooove it!I believe this is the biggest ringlight I have seen.The stand can adjust taller than me I'm 5‚Äù5 and there are no screws so they can't get smooth and stop working,which has been a big problem for me in the past.I rarely write reviews,but I Love it!!
all i can really say is WOW! the shipping was very fast and delivery the next morning was extremely quick and Lightning fast thank you so much Walmart everything was delivered to me on time and early

reviews.title: Ring light makes a huge difference!
reviews.review_text: Omg y'all this ring light makes all the difference it is so awesome! I've always wondered how the people on the youtube videos I watch look so good with nice skin and all...This is their secret! I love this ring light. I found set up to be super easy and didn't really need the instructions. I love that you can plug it into a wall outlet or if you are on the go you can use a usb plug to power it with your phone or power bank or whatever..note the power cord is included the usb cord is not. It comes with its own little storage bag making it compact and easy to store or travel with. The tripod is super easy to adjust and in the picture I included I have two segments of the tripod fully extended and it is taller than me, I'm around 4'10" so with the third segment fully extended it's even taller than me. There is a holder that you assemble and attach to hold your phone, you can set it to hold you phone sideways or straight up and down depending on how you assemble it and there are slots on the inside and outside of the ring light that you can put it in. I love that you can adjust the light to cool or warm as well as adjust the brightness. This thing is bright enough to light up my living room when I turn the lights out and it's the only thing on. The difference it makes in videos and pictures is amazing I love it. The only thing that could possibly make it better is if there was a button on the remote to make your phone take a picture but I don't use the remote anyway as it's not really needed. The buttons for on and off both turn it on and off also there is a button that says neutral...it does not set the light to neutral light it makes the light pulse off and on..the more you push it the more setting it cycles threw as in pulse, flash, etc. So if you have a light flash sensitivity don't use the neutral button.

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.review_text: I have to say I never thought this light would be perfect, but it pretty much is just that. Easy set up, bright, brilliant light. It has the ability to brighten or lessen the brightness of the warm light or the cool light. It is perfect for selfies, TikTok videos, lives, and just about anything you need. Highly recommend!!

reviews.title: Puts other light rings to shame - quality!
reviews.review_text: So where do I begin? I use this for multiple things at home. I sell on Amazon, so it‚Äôs great for product videos and photos, the light is super bright and my favorite thing is how you can adjust the din of the light. It‚Äôs not cheap like others I‚Äôve tried and you can get the perfect white or warm light with it. Others I‚Äôve tried have a button for low, medium or bright. This you can adjust it to the perfect level. THe phone holder is great as well and doesn‚Äôt feel like cheap plastic that will break easily. I also love that it charges your phone.

reviews.title: Beginner like me
reviews.review_text: If you are beginner in videoing and lighting this might be a good start for the price. I can already tell though there are many features that this does not have that others might that would make the process easier. The camera holder works but you really don't have any fine adjustments with alignment or straightening. The brightness of the light is good but you cannot change the color of the light say to pink or blue. The description of the product is spot I was not expecting these abilities but now know why other more expensive products have these features

reviews.title: Love but the ring light needs more bubble wrap
reviews.review_text: I've bought this product before and I loved it. I saw it was on promotion and decided to buy a new one to throw my old one out. I havent been home since it arrived which was two days ago and I just got home. The product had a crack which affected the brightness of the ring light. I had to return it. Hopefully my replacement isn't broken. However, Great product!

reviews.title: Lights flicker, cheap!
reviews.review_text: The product is cheaply made. The lights flicker off and on when in use, even at full power. The plastic used is cheap. Guess I got what I paid for, a cheap piece of junk!

reviews.title: It's okaayyy
reviews.review_text: I needed a bigger ring light which this has and the price was reasonable.. But the stand is flimsy, the phone holder doesn't hold the weight of my iPhone 16 pro max so it droops down. The white ring light setting has a super high pitched ringing noise that I can't stand. It doesn't do this with the colour mode but I don't use the colour mode. Needless to say I will be returning this product.

So useless and bulky. Not convinient. Short cord. Low angle flexibility HAND FITS ONLY mobile ..THE rest for tablet of camery will have to tey to find and buy additional MAYBE comparable to stand. WASTED MONEY!

reviews.title: Pretty impressive
reviews.review_text: This was much nicer than I expected. It seems very well made and sturdy. The height adjusts from roughly 2 1/2 feet to 6 or 7 feet. The holder of the phone can hold it vertical or horizontal. The base has three feet that go flat on the floor so are very steady and feels secure. The brightness adjusts from low to medium to high. At first I had some trouble getting the remote to work but after putting in the batteries again and trying again it worked. My granddaughter put the light together in about 15 minutes without really looking at instructions. It seemed pretty intuitive to figure out. I can't think if any negatives about it. It has a carry case with handles if you want to break it down and carry it somewhere. It is really very nice and I would highly recommend it.

reviews.title: Cord has a shot toon it
reviews.review_text: There's a shortage in the cord so the light doesn't get as bright. Only why it would work is if I keep wiggling the cord!! I'm definitely not satisfied!!!

reviews.title: Been using it for a year and it's great!
reviews.review_text: I recommend it, good lamp if you stand up straight! But, when tilted, it doesn't hold up well. Shines brightly, remote control works. I have been using it for a year and everything is fine.

reviews.title: No Help
reviews.review_text: Part of it doesn't work. I've been trying to contact support at walmart customer service and through the manufacturer. Convenient that no one can help me! Don't waste your money. If it's broken they won't help you. Find something similar on Amazon. Wayyy better service!

reviews.title: Did the model change? We receive different ones no
reviews.review_text: I have 10 of this in total now for my shop. However the last time I ordered they sent me a different model event hough I literally bought from the same link and the product description was the same as my old ones. Not sure if they changed to a new model so they need to update the website...but the old one was very good. 8 of the ones we have are outstanding. Problem with last 2 we got they don't have the on/off switch at the back but a button in the front u can adjust the brightness but not practical.

reviews.title: Depends on the year it was made
reviews.review_text: The quality depends on the year it was made: The 2024 version (noted on the back of the box) works great and was a gift. I ordered this one and it was a 2021 model: the lamp support at top is defective and not designed to securely hold the lamp in position. It's completely different internally. If you can find the 2024 model, try it-- it works great!

reviews.title: Be careful
reviews.review_text: Overall is very good you get a lot of life when I do my reviews, the video be extra clear but one thing it started smoking. I don't know why I don't keep it plugged up. The only time I plug it in with I'm doing my reviews then I unplug it. If anyone do buy this do not keep it plugged in, but overall is very good. I will be ordering another one. I just have to keep a eye on it to make sure it doesn't start smoking or burning again.

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.review_text: Great lighting love the remote control feature

reviews.title: Missing Pieces
reviews.review_text: The remote and phone mount were missing so I could not use the product for its intended purpose

reviews.title: ring line
reviews.review_text: it was confusing on putting together and the light keeps going in and out for some reason
Got my item and the cord had a shortage in it literally wasn't working at all
it was suppose to b next day shipping cuz my BFF had to hace it for her online schooling
despite repeated efforts to ensure everry connection was complete, accurate, tight, and as made to be, this always glitches and flickers

reviews.title: Grate Ring Light
reviews.review_text: It's amazing for $30 and it came on time and I like how it's better than the first time I order it from here.

reviews.title: Light is possessed
reviews.review_text: oddly, it turns on by itself, for apparently no reason. This renders the remote useless as the only way to avoid is to completely shut off model in back. Besides this, the build is slightly flimsy.
I'm happy with happy with light. It does everything I need it to do.

reviews.title: It will help you a lot!
reviews.review_text: It's worth the price and easy to use!

Well when I receive my ring light it was damaged the black bag that it came in left marks on the light and I don't know how because it was in the plastic.. I think it was used all ready. I purchase it only had it for 1 day. And the stand is not strong enough for the light. The light is real bright

reviews.title: Just spend more and get better
reviews.review_text: I would recommend spending a little more and getting a better light. I thought I was getting a good deal but this is really poor quality. The part that holds your phone came broke. I had to zip tie everything just so it would be sturdier. The light doesn't even sit on the tripod straight it leans over. There's no way to tighten it.

reviews.title: Excellent product
reviews.review_text: Great Vivitar creator pkg. Comes with carrying bag for your 18‚Äô ring light and accessories. Light stand adjust 16.7 to 63‚Äù. Phone cradle adjustable, and remote is very handy. Adjustable bright and white controls in back. Use your own USB for charging. Attaches to my small digital camera too! happy with the Vivitar Creator Series, great for projects, and gift for video and photography users. Highly recommend. A+

reviews.title: Very Nice and Useful
reviews.review_text: This ring light set is very nice and useful for customizing lighting for photos, videos, and online meetings. I really like that the set includes a pod for to the light and a cradle to put a phone in, everything you need to start using it right out of the box. Assembly was fairly straightforward; however I had some trouble sliding the bottom of the gooseneck mount (for the phone cradle) into a slot. What you will need to do is unscrew it some to get it to fit. It would have been very helpful if the instructions included that detail. There is a remote that comes with this set as well that allows you change the brightness and color temperature of the light. There is also a night mode button on the remote which is a useful feature. A nice carrying bag is also included with the set which a big plus. Overall, this is a great addition to a studio to facilitate producing high-quality photos and videos.

reviews.title: To ship it back it cost more than the ring light.
reviews.review_text: The main piece that connects the phone to the ring light is too big and does not fit into the bracket. When I called Vivitar they told me I had to pay for the ring light to be shipped back because they had to replace the whole light. The shipping costs more than the ring light. So now I just have a ring light that can only be used as a light as the phone cannot be held. *It says I have to mention I'm a walmart associate. ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.title: Perfect for anyone!
reviews.review_text: No matter what kind of content you create and put online, this ring light will be a welcome addition. The height is adjustable and it includes a handy phone holder. I use it to help with my yoga photos for Instagram. The light offers several levels of brightness as well as temperature. The remote makes it easy to turn on and off and experiment with light from a distance. I highly recommend this! *I received a complimentary ring light in exchange for my review. All opinions are my own.*

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.review_text: Love this ring light. My brother bad a "photo booth" at his wedding with one of these ring lights and I decided I wanted to get one for my wedding next year. It is simple easy to set up and comes with a remote for faster and easier use. Works with my android and my partners iphone. Bright light, and can adjust the settings to what you need.

reviews.title: Wow!! What a difference
reviews.review_text: My first ring light. Wow!! What difference, should have gotten one of these a long time ago. If you find you‚Äôre not as photogenic as you would like to be while video chatting, you should give one of these a shot. I plan to use this for video chats with friends and family and telehealth appointments from now on. So easy to set up. Another avenue I want to explore is how I can improve the pics and videos of the caterpillars from our butterfly garden. Occasionally we bring some inside to raise while they transform from caterpillars to chrysalis to butterflies. I‚Äôm positive the ring light will be a valuable tool. It‚Äôs lightweight and easy to transport in the soft sided carry case which is provided. The stand is adjustable from 16.9 to 63 inches and pretty sturdy. It‚Äôs made of metal on the bottom with plastic poles. The cord is fairly long and a power supply box is included. The manual is more like a pamphlet and could be more detailed especially concerning the remote control. The remote is touchy and I‚Äôm still trying to figure out how to adjust the light settings with it, which vary from warm to cool and in degrees of brightness. However the light unit itself has buttons on the back to control the light settings so you don‚Äôt have to use the remote. There are also four places to mount your phone to the light unit using the bendable phone holder for more angles. I would recommend this set if you are looking for a larger ring light as it is a generous 18 inches and a good value for the price.
i think i got what i paid for with this purchase 10/10 you should get this üëåüèæüíØ
Perfect lighting. Only issue is the base isn't steady and tumbles easily.
I am very pleased with this item and excited to use it.
This is very good quality and it is very bright for only $20 I am surprised would recommend
it does not have a button to take pictures and it does not change colors and im really disappointed with it overall

reviews.title: Intensity dial is not working
reviews.review_text: Maybe I got a bad one, but the intensity button does not work unless I tap it multiple time. The plastic feel cheap

reviews.title: Worth the price
reviews.review_text: This thing is HUGE!!!!! And SUPER bright.. a little too bright. But it's adjustable. Worth the price!

reviews.title: Broken on delivery
reviews.review_text: One of my lights came broken and unfortunately I'm far too busy to try and return it. It's a huge pain to try and fix the issue and get another one.

reviews.title: 3 STARS MAX
reviews.review_text: This ring light was very flimsy and it broke the first time I ever collapsed the light to transport it

reviews.title: Great for on a budget!
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical bout buying this because i seen bad reviews which idk why because i love the ring light it's so bright %26 cute i hope it lasts.

reviews.title: Provides full-spectrum light
reviews.review_text: My phone takes mediocre pictures with its flash so I was glad to see this ring light available at Walmart. It comes with a sturdy easy-to-adjust tripod and the light itself is a lightweight plastic. My box had no instructions but I found a how-to video on youtube. One part was missing-- the piece that connects the light to the tripod. I plugged in the light and was happy with the even coverage and the two switches for adjustments. The remote control (requires 2 AAA batteries) functioned well. I suggest a potential buyer open the box in the store to verify that all parts and the instruction manual are there before purchasing.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: This is my second purchase of this item. I first came across this item during a Black Friday sale in 2021. I was so excited with how this product functioned!! After a move in late 2023 I decided to purchase a second one to go along with the original. To my disappointment there's a short in the port for the adapter, the holder for the phone is inoperable. I've DIY my own way to still be able to utilize the LED Light itself being as though that was the main point of purchase. Overall great lighting. Still recommend.

reviews.title: Very ease to use!
reviews.review_text: This ring light set is absolutely amazing. The brightness level is great and can be adjusted according to your liking. I love taking pictures, so this works wonderfully in my bedroom. It definitely makes such a huge difference in pictures and videos. It's also quite easy to set up! I love that it comes with a carrying case, makes it easy to carry it anywhere you want to go. I love that the stand can be adjusted as well, can be used when I'm sitting down or standing up. I highly recommend!

reviews.title: Better Lighting = Better Video Calls
reviews.review_text: I am not a social media celebrity or anything, so I thought this would be useless to me. I planned on giving as a gift after I tried it. Boy was I surprised! When used for video chatting, it adds immediacy and intimacy to the conversation. At first, I thought it was coincidence that my conversations went better, but now I'm convinced that good lighting makes a huge improvement in my ability to communicate. My phone and smaller tablet fit perfectly but laptops and larger tablets will not. DSLR cameras or anything with UNC threading on the bottom will attach just fine. Height and angle adjustment were great and the tripod is quality. It's a little difficult to setup, but thankfully you only have to do that once. It has a light warmth setting but the warmest setting is not as red as I would like. It is also EXTREMELY bright. Even on the low setting it can be fatiguing to the eyes after an extended conversation. I would not recommend to anyone with glasses due to glare. Overall, this is a great product and useful even if you are not trying to be an influencer.

The instructions are horrible. I don‚Äôt like that the stand becomes unstable the higher you adjusted it. I had to remove the case from my phone and open the phone holder up to the widest length just to fit my phone into the device; I have an iPhone 11 plus. The legs are unstable and do not lock into place if you have it at a higher height. The one thing I liked is the remote control; make sure you have batteries, it doesn‚Äôt come with it. I‚Äôve used it once and I‚Äôll try once more to see if it‚Äôs worth keeping or returning.

reviews.title: I was sad it didn't work for me
reviews.review_text: I went ahead and returned it. Unfortunately, the screw must have been made with a very flimsy metal: every time I screwed the top back on, it would come loose and the metal would shave off/push down leaving no ridges in the screw. As a result of it coming loose, it fell off a few times, had I not caught it, it definitely could have been a hazard. All of this happened the same night, wish I loved it and kept it as I definitely need a good ring light, sadly, this was not it. Walmart is processing my refund as we speak. I appreciate how low-hassle it was.

It was hard to find a ring light that just went into a moral outlet instead if a usb. And the carrying case was a surprise bonus. But I did return this because I thought the remote was to take pictures like a lot of the other ones. I purchased this this to take our Christmas pictures and needed the remote to snap the pics.

reviews.title: Light Ring
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this light ring. It arrived yesterday, April 19, 2021. I put it together as stated in the instructions, easily put together, instructions could have been printed a little bit bigger. The light works amazingly well, keeps things true to color. Only glare is with my glasses, but that's with any light. Easily moved around my house, and it comes with a travel bag. The USB port charges my phone without any problems. I absolutely recommend this for anyone looking for a ring light.

reviews.title: Great for You Tubers
reviews.review_text: My grandson, who has ambitions of being a famous You Tuber, fell in love with this light. The light has great features, he loves the remote, there are three settings for light color and adjustable brightness controls. Comes with everything you need, including a tripod and goose neck to place the phone or camera, also a USB port so you can plug your phone in while videoing. Just got it, but he has been using it non stop for hours now. Very pleased.

reviews.title: Excellent for a Beginner
reviews.review_text: Excellent for a Beginner. This light ring does all that the light ring needs to do for a beginner. Online resellers can invest in this light ring as a first-time purchase and then move upward to a better light ring once the reseller learns how to best use the light ring. I use this light ring, mixed with sunlight streaming through my window, to light my products. Beginners can buy this light ring with confidence, and the ring is easy to put together simply with a small bit of patience and a quick look at the box.

reviews.title: It‚Äôs like a Pro Set
reviews.review_text: This ring light set is incredible. I take a lot of pictures and really wanted to start making videos and I needed this so bad. The set comes with a carrying case which I‚Äôve been using, and it has a remote control for the ring light so you can dim it or brighten it, and the light itself is very strong. There are almost 500 led‚Äôs, and it also has two different phone/ tablet holders. One is on the stand and is bendy so I can get every angle, and one is close to the ring light. The stand itself is very sturdy, I had it on the beach with no problems. Im really happy with my set.

reviews.title: Don‚Äôt waste your money
reviews.review_text: The light itself is great but the complete product is not: mine was good Impossible to assemble, I had to use a hammer to get two parts to fit inside each other, so now the ring doesn‚Äôt pivot anymore. Also the footing is not solid. It won‚Äôt stay up at the desired height so it‚Äôs very frustrating. Other than that, the remote control is good, the light options are good. The phone holder is not super flexible or sturdy. If you‚Äôre planning to use it a lot, I would not recommend this product. Probably will return it.

reviews.title: Wish it wasn't missing so many pieces
reviews.review_text: Missing the pieces to hold the phone and tablet as well as the wireless remote , the part where you connect the light to the stand was bend/ broken so it was unable to even properly be set up have to return it. The light overall is bright and perfect size

reviews.title: Ring light came with missing items
reviews.review_text: I received the package with the box beat up but it was in a nice box not thinking it was going to be looking like someone tried to open it . When j open the box it only came with the ring light and the remote . I did not receive the legs or charger . So I can‚Äôt say if it works just yet . But it‚Äôs nice looking other than that .

reviews.title: Best budget friendly ring light for us girlies
reviews.review_text: I had this exact one for about 2 years for around $50 in store and the tripod stand finally broke on me awhile back bought a different *cheaper* one off amazon that didn't last more than a year lol and i'm a social media influencer so these ring lights are definitely needed once the cheaper one broke off amazon I decided to stick with what ik and purchasing this again and this time it was wayyyy cheaper from $50 to $30 with the quality stillll being the same from the last time I had it awhile back and im happy i decided to go back to my roots and what i'm originally used toü•∞

reviews.title: Missing parts
reviews.review_text: I received my light called manufacturer. Previous opened item. Missing remote and the part that holds the phone. Only long part came with it: extender. I was told mail the unit back which would cost me 40.00 then it would take at minimum 90 days to see about my order. Went to Walmart to be told nothing they can do. Because I purchased online. I'm stuck with something I can't use. No one has contacted me back from anywhere. Not even corporate

reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!!!
reviews.review_text: My ring light has broke it's been in the box until I got it out to stream and put it all together stood for a few minutes then the whole ring light fell to the ground ughhhh I'm very disappointed where the part it fell apart and all the pieces that fell out when the ring light fell to the ground ü•∫üò≠

reviews.title: A very nice quality light ring for all
reviews.review_text: This is quite a step up from smaller, cheaper light rings. Not only is this 18" light ring so much larger than typical 8" rings, but you have adjustments to brightness and color levels, which can be done manually via controls on the back of the ring or via the included remote. The phone holder is mounted on a fully adjustable snake, so you can tilt the ring, while also adjust the phone side to side and adjust any skewing. Multiple sections to the sturdy tripod enable perfect height. This is good for professionals or also to give amateurs a step up. You can even use the USB slot to charge/plug in your phone or for other accessories.

reviews.title: worked just like I needed it too
reviews.review_text: This product has worked just like I needed it too. The fact that you can change the color temperature is by far one of the best features. The one thing that could change is how tight you can tighten the top section of the tripod. It can get a little wobbly at times if it isn‚Äôt tightened every time you use it.

reviews.title: Great ring light, works really well!
reviews.review_text: This ring light is just the thing whether you are a pro or novice. It was easy to assemble and has so many amazing features. It was more than I hoped for! I do webinars for my job occasionally and was looking for something to brighten my face. I had no idea you could get one with such great features! The part that holds the phone is easily adjustable as is the stand. You even get a remote that fully controls the power and lighting levels! I think this model has everything anyone could want. It really brightens my face on the screen which is just what I needed. Before I got this, because there is only overhead lighting in my office it was difficult to see my face. Now I almost look like a movie star!

reviews.title: Ring light
reviews.review_text: This ring light was pretty easy to install without directions. When I plugged it in I noticed there are warm to bright white lights depending on what you want to film or capture. I love the fact it includes a holder for my phone which I can connect through Bluetooth.

reviews.title: Good for a first timer
reviews.review_text: This is a cheaply made product and has several minor issues, but is works really well and is great if you have a budget and need a ring light for the first time. The lighting works well and the overall set up does the job. Professionals will want a better a sun more expensive model, but this does the job

reviews.title: Nice Unit, but not easy clear instruction
reviews.review_text: Disappointed in the company, the product its self is nice, but no easy clear instruction. I had to get my neighbors help to put it together. So I docked a star, for I need simple clear instructions to make a 5 star review. Maybe my box was missing that, but if you are not Tec savvy you will need some help. After it was put together it was great!

reviews.title: A professional quality light ring
reviews.review_text: This is a professional quality LED light ring. It was much easier to assemble than I expected and it is easy to use. This is a very useful light for the amateur or the professional photographer. I am a professional artist and craftsman and an amateur photographer. It is very important for me to take good photos of my work, and with good quality equipment like this, it is much easier for me to do it myself.

reviews.title: it is perfect size and light brightness!!
reviews.review_text: 18" PRO RING LIGHT, I definitely love it !!!! ... It is very easy to assemble, it has different height sizes, the size of the light ring is quite large, and the different functions of changing the lights and its brightness is fantastic. It would have been great that in control they had added a button to control the cell for photos and videos.

reviews.title: its all there
reviews.review_text: works fine had to YouTube how to put it together but it is so amazing got it for myself glad I didn't listen to the negative reviews on here. and yes all the peaces are there you have to put it together a centernt way. go at it at an angle not straight up and down

reviews.title: Good light and stand, terrible goose neck
reviews.review_text: The ring is big, stand is tall, light is controlled with 2 knobs for warmth and intensity. Great. However, upon second use(I literally just got the product) the cap and left half of the goose neck holder came off and could not hold my phone up which defeated the purpose of this product. I'll have to try gorilla glue on this brand new item

reviews.title: The Only Ring Light You‚Äôll Need
reviews.review_text: Amazing light that does it all! It stands at 5.25 feet, which is quite tall for a ring light! It‚Äôs 18-inches, which lights up your face and things around you. There are different lighting modes, a remote to control the light, and a stable place to keep your phone - you can change the angle of your phone. I absolutely love that this comes with an option to plug it in a wall socket. Most ring lights only come with a USB option so the wall outlet was a welcome change. Of course, it has a USB option as well. It comes with a carrying case, making it super easy to carry it anywhere. You can adjust the height, adjust the brightness, adjust the light color, adjust the angle of your phone, adjust your phone to be vertical or horizontal, and take photos and videos while sitting far away.

reviews.title: Poor manufacturing.
reviews.review_text: Wish I could give 0 stars. I've ordered this item twice. The first time parts of the equipment was missing (wireless camera remote). I returned the the item and received another one; that was about a week and a half process. So, I received the replacement order. Wireless camera remote is still missing, but it's advertised to have one on the front of the box (Stares in confusion). The legs are super loose on this one, even tho I tightened them with all the strength in my body. Also the stand doesn't actually lock in place either, the segments slide down at the slightest pressure or adjustment of my phone. Product was put together extremely poorly and very wobbly because of this. I hate this product. However the actual lighting it self is straight. I took this L so you don't have too. Currently debating if I should get a 3rd replacement or just a refund.

reviews.title: Great Ring Light!

reviews.title: VIVITAR Light Ring and Accessories
reviews.review_text: I actually call this lightning kit ‚ÄúThe Magical Lighting Ring.‚Äù Vivitar brand has always meant quality for me and this LED Ring Light with adjustable stand doesn‚Äôt disappoint. The stand can extend up to 63 inches and the light ring encompasses 416 LEDs. The ring can be adjusted for different degrees of brightness. Included in the kit is a phone holder, wireless remote, batteries not included, AC adapter and an access port for USB charging. The soft carrying case is an added bonus.

reviews.title: Super bright light

reviews.title: anyone else‚Äôs ring light doing this?

reviews.title: Poor quality
reviews.review_text: Was a waste. I made the mistake thinking, the more I spend, the bigger the light, the better the quality. Boy, was I wrong. Took is home first time and the stand broke while assembling. I took it back to the store and exchanged it thinking I had a faulty one. The second one the stand broke yet again within a couple uses after moving it from room to room. The weight of the light makes it top heavy and the stand is so cheaply made, it gives under the pressure of it. definitely not worth $50. I returned yet again and exchanged this time for a different brand altogether. Dont waste your time.

If you are wanting to take pictures of your products on a table this is not the light for you. The ring will not stay at any angle except for straight up. The bolt is a square and doesn‚Äôt allow enough grip on the plastic. I am returning this immediately. It does take good pics standing up but I‚Äôm afraid the bolt will give out since it is already floppy in either direction

reviews.title: Just what a need
reviews.review_text: OMG! I am so excited. I'm a journalist and for a long time I was looking for a tripod and light ring that would meet all my requirements until I finally found it! It's perfect, light, practical and the perfect size. Impeccable quality! 100% recommended, it arrived super fast too. highly valued. It has several light temperatures to suit your needs, and the tripod extends almost to my size, so it's perfect.

reviews.title: Stand fell apart, all small plastic pieces snapped
reviews.review_text: All stand pieces broke and or snapped in the first two weeks, couldn't support the weight of both the light head and a cell phone. Incredibly frustrated considering the cost, I had an $11 light last 3 months and it broke due to accidentally being knocked over, this light was simply faulty.

reviews.title: Top Heavy
reviews.review_text: Purchased this awhile back for a Christmas gift to my daughter and wish I got it at the price now listed not worth the price I paid! Top heavy! The legs and bottom portion should‚Äôve had move weight to support the heaviness of the ring light and a phone. I have an IPhone XR with a light case and that added significant weight to the stand. You definitely won‚Äôt be able to extend this to full height without the worry of it tipping over! As far as a camera I would dare put the weight of a camera into the slot!

reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money.
reviews.review_text: Well it was only $50 but somehow I was hoping it would be suitable. Basically it is cheap and poor quality. The tripod is hideously poor quality. Well, actually everything is poorly made. This is going back to the store i'm not even going to finish putting it together. Note all the 5 star reviews are 'incentivized reviews' whatever that means. Cheap and not cheerful!

reviews.title: Not worth it, flimsy, and incorrect parts!
reviews.review_text: Ring light itself gets the job done (lighting wise) Everything else, awful! Stand is not very durable, especially the higher up you raise it. The phone holder, lol, totally pointless! The gooseneck attachment does not fit into ANY of the 8 slots there are around the light to attach phone. As for Vivitar customer service, I wouldn't even bother. Complete waste of time. My opinion and best advice, look for a different one.

reviews.title: Absolutely Delightful Unit (back for a 2nd!)
reviews.review_text: We were lucky to pick this up when it was on sale and I'm back to buy another at full price! I got this for ‚Äúcreator stuff‚Äù but we quickly adapted it for use as a light in our living room! üòÖ We kinda like the look of it‚Äî vibes with our LR's theme lol‚Äîand it provides a substantial amount of light that I can tune to the natural light. Very bright light! It's positioned so it fires up into the corner of the room. This is not a lighting system that will feel ‚Äúmodern‚Äù, it will feel like the design is from 10-15 years ago. That's expected for a light this powerful at this price point. Keeping the price point out in mind we move to the build quality. I do not have training in the art of tripodlightotry so please forgive the terminology I must use ‚ò∫Ô∏è The tripod uses friction to hold each level of telescopingly-friendly extensions. Each lavel has a flappy-boi on the outside. When that boi is opened, the friction is disengaged and the extensions can slide freebally. To propose to friction, you first keep the extension at the desired height, get down on one knee, and close the flappy-boi. This system has its flaws and for some would be the dealbreaker üò¢ The friction is not great and I had to shimmy some cardboard around the extensions so as to provide some more emotional stability for friction. The system for changing the angle of the head is straightforward and surprisingly durable however it's a little loose. I added a washer and it has been perfect. Don't over-tighten or it could snap. Iirc, the USB port is 2.1a 10w. It didn't know the power output before I bought it so I was surprised. We use it to charge many things throughout the day! The camera connection equipment doesn't include any of those stupid ‚Äúball %26 socket with threaded collar‚Äù features. It's not perfect but it's more secure than those BS systems. The remote control is‚Ä¶OK, it's big than some of the other lights in this price point; it doesn't have a ‚Äúcredit card style‚Äù remote control. It's bulkier and uses I think AAA or AA batteries. It just makes sense to be with this unit. Once you setup the light, secure the flappy-bois, and plug in the heavy AC adaptor‚Äîit's an old school two-piecer‚Äî you'll know exactly what I mean üòä I would recommend this light!

reviews.title: Look at something else
reviews.review_text: Pros light is bright and goes from dim to daylight. Con the join that connects the light to the stand used to angle falls over all the time. It you tighten anymore you will break the plastic. I will be returning this tomorrow. when I saw the angel join I knew it was trouble before I assembled it.

reviews.title: Take the hole thing and throw it in the dumpster
reviews.review_text: Absoulute trash. Bought 2 weeks ago, phone stand already broke, wont stay standing the poles just goes back down, and top of that the warranty is trash. instead of sending me the new phone holder piece, they want me to send back the whole ring light that will probably be $40 after paying $50 for the light! Screw THAT!

reviews.title: Great for live videos
reviews.review_text: Great investment for my online business. Customers told me about ring lights but I still had no clue so my daughter and I looked up several and landed on this one because of its size and stand. My live videos are so much clear. I love it!! it was easy to hook up the ring light stand and adjust it to geight I needed.

reviews.title: Lit up His Face
reviews.review_text: I got this ring light for my husband who streams on Twitch, Tuneablepower. His lighting was not up to par until we set this up. There was some minimal assembly to get this together. But the ring was a lot larger than I anticipated, a basketball might fit through it. It lights his face up now. It sits on a stand. And its easy to use.

reviews.title: A bright light
reviews.review_text: Amazing for the price! I have a more expensive ring light, and honestly would be perfectly happy just using the Vivitar! The stand is nice, and the light is very bright. The light is adjustable in brightness and well as warm/cool. Easy to assemble. Also includes a carrying bag!

reviews.title: The durability and stability is horrible
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs cheap. Not durable at all. I have to say it has great lighting and cool features with the remote. I was satisfied with it until it broke on me, very easily. The tripod pole has 3 settings but the one at the very top holding the ring light is so cheaply made. I had to exchange mine for a different one and as soon as I set it up and tried raising the pole that holds the ring light, it broke again without any effort. The piece that holds it just snapped off and the pole went inside the bigger pole and there is no way of getting it out. This is the second time and it happened to me the same day. I got both receipts as proof. The first one lasted me about 15 days before it just broke by setting the pole at a taller height. The second one seemed to have been broken because I wasn‚Äôt even able to pull up the pole holding the ring light and it broke off without any force. Now I will have to go back to Walmart and to get a refund. I won‚Äôt give it another chance since it‚Äôs just not worth my time or anyones time. My feedback on this item is to make it more solid and durable, even if it‚Äôs cheap materials it shouldn‚Äôt break this easily for its price. I do not recommend this ring light as it is now. I‚Äôm about to go for a refund as I write this review. Save your time and money.

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.review_text: My husband is still working from home and the lighting setup we had just wasn't working. I got this on a whim and it's perfect for what he needs. It's slim so it fits behind his desk, the tripod was easy to set up and so far is fantastic. There are several settings allowing you to adjust the color of the warmth of the lighting. Overall I'd say it's perfect!

reviews.title: Design flaws, but great price..
reviews.review_text: You can see the design flaws, hence the low price. Base is not sturdy, at all, I had to use my old stand to support the base. They also put the adjustment buttons on the back of the light...great value though.

reviews.title: Bad quality. cheap plastic breaks ez
reviews.review_text: The idea is great. light is amazing if it worked, this would have been a good setup. i had two of these and both the stands failed on me within 3 uses. very disappointed.

reviews.title: Missing pieces!
reviews.review_text: I just bought this light and a piece was missing. Went to exchange it and now this one has the piece that was missing but is now missing another piece!!! I‚Äôm going to see if I can get everything if not then I‚Äôm returning it.

reviews.title: Best Price
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this ring light! It‚Äôs the best price I‚Äôve found for the 18‚Äù size, and has so many great features. I love that I can plug my phone into it to charge as well! So worth the $$$
It‚Äôs great however I don‚Äôt like the fact that it kept going down (the tripod) when it was not on carpet. The lighting is great though

reviews.title: Faulty accessories! disappointed

reviews.title: The ringing ring light
reviews.review_text: Maybe I just got a bad one. my ringlight makes a HIGH PITCHED ringing noise Nothing I can do to stop it spent $50 just to not b able to use it

reviews.title: 4 thumbs up!!
reviews.review_text: Very high quality. Everything arrived intact and exactly as advertised. Very happy with our purchase.

reviews.title: the light is great, the stand is cheap,
reviews.review_text: Great light, terrible stand. stand cant support the weight of the light correctly. it wont stay angled and will clsoe on your hand. hurts

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: Very nice ring light for an affordable price. It‚Äôs a good size and has an adjustable brightness knob.

reviews.title: No phone mount.. don‚Äôt buy on clearance.
reviews.review_text: I bought it in the store it was on clearance for $17 and i see why. It‚Äôs missing the phone mount that‚Äôs shown on the box.

reviews.title: Can‚Äôt mount phone stand
reviews.review_text: Why does the phone stand not fit inside the slot? Factory malfunction‚Ä¶ do not buy this. It‚Äôs not accurate!!! China product

reviews.title: Amazing product

It's just what I need to brighten my room. Shipping was accurate and on time.

reviews.title: Missing parts
reviews.review_text: Missing parts. Can't get it to stand properly

This is a must have item in all salons. I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Parts don‚Äôt fit together correctly and not sturdy for my phone. Had a lot of difficulty
The place that holds your phone is very wobbly and fell to the floor the first use.
It‚Äôs giving what, it‚Äôs was suppose to GIVE. I‚Äôm very satisfied with this ring light.

reviews.title: Do not buy!
